name: Article
heading: Create articles within your page.
usage:
The article component consists of the article itself, a title and meta data.

.uk-article 	Add this class to define the Article component. Typically you would use an  element for this.

.uk-article-title 	Add this class to a heading to create an article title. Typically you would use a  element for this.

.uk-article-meta 	Add this class to a paragraph which contains meta data about your article.
